eight/8
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

step with feet splayed outwards
sloping eyebrows, formed like character for "eight"
splayfoot
intoeing/pigeon toes/knock-knees

the eight-character slogan for the economic policy proposed by 李富春[Li3 Fu4 chun1] in 1961: 調整、鞏固、充實、提高|调整、巩固、充实、提高 "adjust, consolidate, enrich and improve"/a policy expressed as an eight-character slogan
lit. there is not even the first stroke of the character 八 (idiom)/fig. things have not even begun to take shape/no sign of success yet

definition: mustache shaped like character 八
splayed feet
bow legs/bandy legs
to have one's fortune read/system of fortune telling based on a person's date and time of birth, according to 干支 (sexagenary cycle)

sentences.english: The connecting end of the fish collecting net and the fish attracting net is provided with a V-shaped net door.
sentences.chinese: 集鱼网与诱鱼网的连接端设有一个八字网门。

sentences.english: I wrote my birth time on a piece of paper and handed it to the fortune-teller.
sentences.chinese: 我把生辰八字写在一张纸上，交给了算命先生。

sentences.english: The round coil and splayed coil were tested respectively.
sentences.chinese: 分别对圆形线圈和八字线圈进行了测试。

sentences.english: We took the curved-shape splint instead of the figure-of-eight splint for immobilization.
sentences.chinese: 我们采用弧形夹板取代八字肩带的固定。

sentences.english: One of the best anime songs…
sentences.chinese: 八字年代的儿歌，是大人都啱听的。

sentences.english: The essence of the eight-character policy is readjustment.
Then, he had accepted the treatment consisted of a figure-of-eight splint and sling immobilization.
sentences.chinese: 当时他接受八字肩带和三角巾悬挂固定的治疗。

sentences.english: Especially the homeowner's character, must not be in conflict.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是房屋主人的八字，一定不能够相冲。

sentences.english: He had shaved his signature beard and moustache.
sentences.chinese: 当时他已经刮去了他标志性的大胡子和八字须。

sentences.english: The photo clarifys the model in a pigeon-toed pose and covering IT modesty with IT hands.
sentences.chinese: 照片中的布吕尼双腿呈内八字姿势，双手遮住了羞处。

sentences.english: Few students like him who has a moustache.
sentences.chinese: 几乎没有学生喜欢他，一个留着八字须的人。

sentences.english: Imagine a giant figure of eight in front of you about 10 feet in front of you.
sentences.chinese: 想象你面前竖着一个约10英尺高的巨型八字结。
她拿他的八字胡开玩笑。

sentences.english: He was heavily-built and sported a red moustache.
sentences.chinese: 他身材魁梧，留着红色的八字胡。

sentences.english: And North Korea clearly is not in the mood.
sentences.chinese: 而且北韩显然八字没一撇。

sentences.english: This fake moustache ring will be useful in all kinds of situations.
sentences.chinese: 这款八字胡形状的戒指在各种场合下都会非常有用哦。

definition: divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date
fate/predestination/divinatory art
the 12 earthly branches 子[zi3], 丑[chou3], 寅[yin2], 卯[mao3], 辰[chen2], 巳[si4], 午[wu3], 未[wei4], 申[shen1], 酉[you3], 戌[xu1], 亥[hai4], used cyclically in the calendar and as ordinal numbers I, II etc
divination/divinatory art
the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1] and twelve earthly branches 十二枝/sexagenary cycle
typical weather in a given season
one's birth data for astrological purposes, combined from year, month, day, hour, heavenly trunk and earthly branch
the 10 heavenly stems 甲[jia3], 乙[yi3], 丙[bing3], 丁[ding1], 戊[wu4], 己[ji3], 庚[geng1], 辛[xin1], 壬[ren2], 癸[gui3], used cyclically in the calendar and as ordinal numbers I, II etc
to have one's fortune read/system of fortune telling based on a person's date and time of birth, according to 干支 (sexagenary cycle)
casting a couple's fortune based on their bithdates (old)
natal chart (astrology)
menstruation/woman's period
good and bad luck (in astrology)
third year C3 of the 60 year cycle, e.g. 1986 or 2046
birth year as designated by animal symbols (mouse, ox, tiger etc)
six close relatives, namely: father 父[fu4], mother 母[mu3], older brothers 兄[xiong1], younger brothers 弟[di4], wife 妻[qi1], male children 子[zi3]/one's kin
